description: This application allows you to test your knowledge in your area of interest. The application asks questions and scores you. You can set the difficulty level (easy, medium or hard , type of questions (multiple or boolean) and select a category (option provided by using help).
exampleInteractions: Alexa Ask Improved Trivia For help
Alexa Ask Improved Trivia To start
name: Improved Trivia
shortDescription: This application allows you to test your knowledge in your area of interest. The application asks questions and scores you.
